body: artifactFeeds: $1  # Required  # Select feeds to authenticate present in this organization
#pythonDownloadServiceConnections:  # Optional  # Select endpoints to authenticate outside this organization.
#onlyAddExtraIndex:  # Optional  # If this is set to true, no feed will be set as the primary index URL. All of the configured feeds/endpoints will be set as extra index URLs. Defaults to false.
Python pip authenticate.description: Authentication task for the pip client used for installing Python distributions
